title: Wine Charms -"Paris Street Sign" theme, wine decor, wine gifts, wine accessories. Unique gifts, Paris decor for entertaining, favors, party, under $15 (6 piece set)
features: This premium set of 6 high quality, stainless steel, custom made Paris wine glass charms adds a classy and sophisticated touch to your gathering and adds a unique characteristic to every glass.

Prevent drink mix ups and tag your glasses to always identify each guests drink with a personalized Paris Street Names, including Boulevard Saint-Germain, Avenue Des Champs Elysees, Rue Montmartre, Rue Du Cloitre Notre-Dame, Place De La Concorde and Avenue De La Grande Armee.
Perfect gift for wine lovers and aficionados, men and women

Wine Charms arrive assembled on a vintage post card ready to give as a party favor, bridal shower favor, wedding favor, birthday gift, housewarming gift. Even pair with a bottle of wine as a unique personalized gift.
See our New York City theme charms as well. New cities coming soon.
